## DefaultLogger interface

默认日志记录器

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface DefaultLogger extends Logger
```

**Extends:** Logger

## Properties

| Property                                     | Modifiers | Type       | Description           |
| -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------- | --------------------- |
| [colors?](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.colors.md) |           | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ 日志颜色 |

## Methods

| Method                                         | Description                                                                |
| ---------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [debug(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.debug.md) | Output debug message to console including appropriate icons                |
| [error(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.error.md) | Output error message to console including appropriate icons                |
| [info(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.info.md)   | Output info message to console including appropriate icons                 |
| [log(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.log.md)     | Output debug message to console including appropriate icons                |
| [trace(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.trace.md) | Output trace message to console. This will also include a full stack trace |
| [warn(msg)](./zhi-log.defaultlogger.warn.md)   | Output warn message to console including appropriate icons                 |
